name: The Unknown (itch) (Expansion)
description: This is a prototype of an upcoming game called The Unknown. In the game you can explore glorious lands filled with mysteries and treasures! You wake up in an old shack and walk outside to find yourself in a new world. This world has castles villages and much more. Look around and see what you can find! The controls are WASD for moving and SPACE to jump and use the MOUSE to look around.
